name: Cookieee
description:
Welcome to Cookie Land, small cookie! Blue monsters are trying to eat you.
Get out of their way and remove them by throwing crumbs of milk chocolate at them.
The more monsters you make disappear the more chocolate crumbs you get.
Collect the crumbs to fight more monsters. Arrows indicate you where to go.

The goal: feed a maximum of blue monsters.

Download the game to start throwing crumbs at blue monsters which grow visibly.

• Tap near you to move.
• Swipe to throw a crumb.
• Pick up the crumbs, once you have fed the monsters.
